title: Mesoporous silica-magnetite nanocomposite: fabrication and applications in magnetic bioseparations.
abstract: De novo material synthesis and application. Novel material with unique properties produced for  Philips Medical Systems Division and others  as part of international collaboration on drug delivery, development of SELDI-ToF and contrasting of patients in medical imaging . Competitively funded with EU FP6 IP project grant 12,000,000 Euro
